cat_feature_intro.show_id: ###-  ***`show_id:`*** Unique identifier for each show (s1, s2).
cat_feature_intro.type: ###-  ***`type:`*** Specifies whether the title is a "Movie" or "TV Show".
cat_feature_intro.title: ###- ***`listed_in:`*** Categories or genres the title falls under ("Documentaries", "TV Dramas").
cat_feature_intro.cast: ###-  ***`cast:`*** The main actors involved in the title.
cat_feature_intro.country: ###- ***`country:`*** The country where the title was produced.
cat_feature_intro.date_added: ###- ***`date_added:`*** The date when the title was added to Netflix.
cat_feature_intro.duration: ###- ***`duration:`*** Duration of the movie (in minutes) or the number of seasons for TV shows.
cat_feature_intro.listed_in: ###- ***`listed_in:`*** Categories or genres the title falls under ("Documentaries", "TV Dramas").

num_feature_intro.release_year: ###- ***`release_year:`*** The year the title was originally released.
